meanings: failing to live up to (one's name, looks, etc.)

idioms.meaning: he that fights and runs away may live to fight another day

idioms.word: 勝つも負けるも時の運
idioms.reading: かつもまけるもときのうん
idioms.meaning: victory depends on the turn of fortune

idioms.word: 勝てば官軍、負ければ賊軍
idioms.reading: かてばかんぐん、まければぞくぐん

idioms.word: 勝って驕らず負けて腐らず
idioms.reading: かっておごらずまけてくさらず
idioms.meaning: in victory, remember your humility; in defeat, remember your fighting spirit

idioms.word: 相撲に勝って勝負に負ける
idioms.reading: すもうにかってしょうぶにまける
idioms.meaning: to ultimately fail despite being in a favourable position

lessons.japanese: 君の歌はプロ顔負けだ。
lessons.english: Your singing puts professional singers to shame.

lessons.japanese: 競馬で負けて、スッテンテンだよ。
lessons.english: I just lost at the races so I'm flat broke.
